title: Housing Damage Leads to Billing Charge
description: After a student moves out of a dorm, the housing staff finds damage to the room, which results in a charge being placed on the student's account.

tasks.description: The RA completes a room condition report upon move-out and documents damages.
tasks.expected_outcome: RA logs a broken window in the housing system.

tasks.description: The housing office assesses a repair fee based on the documented damage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Housing office determines a $150 repair fee.

tasks.description: The housing office posts the damage charge to the student's account in the university's main billing system.
tasks.expected_outcome: A $150 charge is successfully added to the student's tuition bill.
